website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive clear case protects both the screen and the sides, yet it allows access to the necessary buttons and ports.
pros: Two-pack of covers crafted with cutouts for buttons and ports on 40-millimeter Apple Watch 4
Slim TPU case does not add bulk
Screen protector does not diminish touch sensitivity
Covers watch face and rounded edges
cons: Can trap dust, hair, and sweat underneath the case, which can diminish look and function

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Very good overall bumper and screen coverage. I switch between this and another non-screen coverage bumper. I use one because of my clumsy and tendency to lift things around the office. Everything lines up with buttons or openings. Nothing gets in the way of ports etc. Easy to put on and take off. Will obviously hold moisture when you’re swimming,showering or get your entire hands submerged in water/washing your hands. I’ve already bumped by wrist into a metal heavy door handle and no damage to the watch and hardly a smudge on the case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TheDonJose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover, excellent product and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I received my first Apple Watch as a Christmas gift from my son 3 years ago. Shortly afterwards, I scratched the screen and was devastated. This Christmas, I got a new Apple Watch and searched for a protective cover. This is the cover I chose. I am absolutely pleased with the cover. It was easy to install, does not really show and absolutely does not interfere with the functionality of the watch or the rose gold color. If anything, it makes it more reflective. I was so pleased with this product, that I ordered them for my son for his new Apple Watch! Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: khaki

customer_reviews.title: Clear protection
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to put on. No wipes or messy around with placement. It covers the entire watch while allowing access to all the buttons. The only issue I had was keying in my password; you must press carefully and deliberately. Otherwise, it’s very nice, unobtrusive protection.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice screen protector! I feel like it’s going to keep my watch safe from any possible drops or bumps! It even comes with two so I’m pretty happy about that. The only issue I have with it is when you try to swipe the apps to delete them from the watch background you have to slide each one several times before it will work, but it’s a minor issue, I’m just happy my watch is protected!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I wish it was thinner but I like that it protects the entire screen. It has tiny clear dots.. almost invisible so it doesn’t really bother me anymore. You can see the screen clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This case it’s light, and easy to put on to the watch. Very clear. And what I like the most is that this come in a pack of 2 with just that price. So worth buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well, but customer service great.
customer_reviews.text: Although it was good value for 2, I ended up taking my protector off because the touch sensitivity was reduced. My screen wasn’t responding well, or not at all sometimes. The vendor’s customer service was great though. They quickly responded to my complaint and offered a refund.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Apple Watch protection!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Highly recommended! Edit 2/21/19...While reading all the negative reviews about this Apple 4 watchcase protector,....They all seem if the watch ever gets wet or submerged, residual water accumulated between case protector and watch is supposed to dry out by itself??? Not so....Remove case protector from watch, use micro fiber cloth/Terri towel to dry out all surfaces...Re-apply watchcase protector for next rain/water incident... ....I'll re-iterate...If watch ever gets wet,,,,Case protector MUST be removed from watch...dry both pieces completely out and re-install case protector, if that makes any sense?
customer_reviews.author: Rex here in the Big Easy!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got an Apple Watch as an early Christmas present and was trying so hard to be careful with it and not scratch the screen until I found a screen protector I liked. This one is easy to put on, doesn’t hinder my view of the screen, and the touch screen is still responding like it’s supposed to even with the protector on it!! Hoping it holds up! For a while but for the price I paid for 2 of them I definitely will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney K.

customer_reviews.title: Touch pad works!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! Very easy to install and easy to use. I am texting and making calls with my finger therefore it doesnt give you a hard time touching it
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: It is not hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: Ordered thinking I was getting a hard case and I was surprised when I opened my box and it was a silicone-like material. Description needs to be updated to reference just what TPU is. Otherwise, it's easy to install and doesn't inhibit any buttons on my 40mm Apple Watch Series 4 and the band isn't obstructed. Touch screen works perfectly fine as well. Definitely thick enough to keep scratches off the watch which is what I was worried about but was hoping for a little more security with my $400 watch than a 1cm thick piece of silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Touch Screen Hardly Works!
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen on this thing hardly works! It’s so annoying when you try to press things a hundred times on the watch and they don’t work because this screensaver is crap!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!! (Updated: Resolved)
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap design, makes my watch look like super cheap. Had to use excessive force to even get it on my watch. Do not buy!!! Update: Smiling took the extra step to correct the issue and really surprised me. Ill definitely be giving this company more of my business now. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is a nice product. I do not have experience with any other Apple Watch protectors to compare, but it seems to get the job done. I was worried it would be bulky, but it’s fairly slim and not too noticeable. It does smudge easy and you lose a little touch-ability. Not nearly enough to cause frustration. A must have if you are highly active in the elements and need to protect against hard surfaces. Or when your two year old decides to knock it off it’s charging station onto the floor. I wish I had it on when that happened to my watch. It definitely wold have prevented a cracked screen.
customer_reviews.author: Svad

customer_reviews.title: Great clear, responsive screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a screen protector from another vendor. It came damaged. I returned it and the replacement came damaged and my watch would not respond to my touch. That is when I ordered this clear case screen protector. It arrived in a much more protected package and in perfect condition. I installed it easily and love it. My watch has responded to every touch and my screen is crystal clear. I highly recommend this screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: These really work
customer_reviews.text: These protectors completely cover over and tuck under your watch sides so they will not pop off (like the last one I bought). They fit snug and you can put your code in easily without pushing hard. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed. I drop my Apple Watch and broke the glass within 3 weeks of receiving it as a Christmas gift. I was too embarrassed to tell my children who purchased this Apple series 4 watch. Since it was so new, I was able to purchase insurance for the watch and have it repaired. The Smiling Apple Watch clear protector has give me peace of mind. It does not take away from the appearance of my watch nor does it hinder any usage of Apps. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cina W.

customer_reviews.title: Hardly even there
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize when I ordered that the package came with two guards — Such a nice surprise! I was able to install one on my watch & put the second one on my wife’s watch. The guard is easy to install and is hardly noticeable. I was worried it might be bulky but it’s actually very streamlined. My watch still responds well to touch with the cover on, so no issues there. If I ever need to order another, I’ll be getting this one again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Looks horrible, smears
customer_reviews.text: Update: Since writing this review I have been inundated with emails from this company trying to buy my review. They want to pay me $ to remove my bad review of this product. What is the point in reviews if the company is paying people off to remove bad reviews. The product is not worth purchasing. It is what it is. I will be turning them into Amazon. This thing looks horrible on the watch. The face smears and is NOT clear. I cleaned it with their cleaning cloth (which is for the watch), but no matter how I worked with it, it looked terrible. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miz B

customer_reviews.title: All Around Protection for Apple Watch 4
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this case offers almost total protection for your Apple Watch 4. It is open on the bottom so the watch an take your heart rate. It has side cutouts for big round bottom and the speakers on the left side. It offers decent protection as I have fallen at least 3 times and not damaged my watch. Through function of the watch screen works just fine with this case on. The case does discolor overtime and get some marks on it where you bang it. But the price is low so I just replace it in 4 to 6 months. Plus it sold with 2 cases. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Will not respond once you sweat  ***updated***
customer_reviews.text: **Update** After leaving this review of the original screen protector I was contacted by the seller who offered a newer updated version, or a gift card. I opted for the gift card as I have already installed a new screen protector. I still stand by my initial review of the original product so it is below, however the seller has stepped up to make it right. My updated rating is for the response by the seller. The screen protector traps sweat and makes the screen unresponsive. Initially I liked the case until I went for a run. The sweat made it where the screen would not respond to touch, just as others reviews had warned.
customer_reviews.author: Xj Chad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for my new watch
customer_reviews.text: This will be excellent protection for the inevitable dings/scratches that usually occur on a watch. That watch is too expensive not to protect. It was easy to stretch on. One nice thing I noticed is that it's now easier for me to press the watchband release buttons to slide out the bands. The description photos for this protection are outstanding and should answer many questions others may have.
customer_reviews.author: NCWfun

customer_reviews.text: When I received the covers I was very pleased with the clarity. The touchscreen only gave me issues when I entered my lock code but no other time.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingIsSexy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time!!
customer_reviews.text: This case was horrible. I thought the price was great! Getting two for the price of one, AWESOME! But when I got it in the mail, it looked totally different than the pictures on here. The clarity of this case is awful. It has a very plastic like smell. And the worst part...as soon as any type of condensation happens (humidity, working out, raining outside), the case traps it and makes it hard to see your watch face at all. The design might’ve have very good intentions, but it is very flawed and an awful choice! Do yourself a HUGE favor...buy something else!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for using a screen protector since I thought it would provide more protection against scratches on the body of the watch. This fits GREAT! It goes on easily, fits well, provided great protection. It was a nice alternative to the bulkier alternatives. I also liked that it was super easy and fast to install. The only downsides I have seen so far is that the haptic feedback is hard to feel when touching the watch and the side button is covered so you have to press very hard to use that feature. Overall, an awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Something to talk about

customer_reviews.title: Good scratch protection
customer_reviews.text: I love the cover for my iWatch. It protects my watch from dust and most importantly, from scratches. I gave it 4 stars because I use my iWatch in the pool and water gets under the cover. When I am finished in the pool, I have to disassemble the watch...take off the band and cover, dry it all very carefully and thoroughly, and reassemble the whole thing. I don’t know that there are any other her options for this issue, but I am dealing with it. I just hope it lasts ok with all the removal and reinstallation it goes through. Ok herwise, I am very happy with the cover...thank you.
customer_reviews.author: macigirl04

customer_reviews.title: I had one from my iwatch 3 as well
customer_reviews.text: I had one from my iwatch 3 as well from same company my watch was very protected and there was never a delay in screen touch. So when i got the I watch 5 I went and found my order, and searched the companies products and was pleased to see that they had what i needed for my new watch. The only annoying thing is water does get stuck between the watch and the screen protector. But its not that big of a deal to take it off dry it and move on with my day.. Id much rather have to do that then to possibly damage my $500+ dollar watch.

customer_reviews.title: Works just wish is was a couple dollars cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I really like these covers, in-fact I’m on my 4th one as we speak HOWEVER if they were a couple dollars cheaper I would be in LOVE. They work great, I’ve scratched the heck out of this cover and had no damages to my very expensive watch (thank goodness). Now the bad - these covers turn yellow fairly quickly (3 to 4 weeks and they need replaced because I can’t stand the icky yellow looking color). That doesn’t change my mind about buying these, now I just buy a couple at a time. Not 💯 loyal yet, contemplating on buying a cheaper version next go round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the 40mm Series 5 Apple Watch. (I want to start with I think those adhesive screen protectors are trash they always had bubbles or a corner would peel up) I previously had the series 1 that had a deep scratch across the entire screen from a cat that scratched me as I work at an animal hospital.... that was inevitable and I needed something to protect my new watch from getting scratched. This fits perfectly, it’s easy to put on and covers every side of the screen and the screen works perfectly. It even came with two?! I didn’t expect a two pack. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Russ Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with high hopes. I wanted something that covered my entire Watch including the sides and screens. When I got the case and put it on, it made my Watch screen hard to see. Some of the touches were unresponsive. The plastic this is made of holds fingerprints and other marks easily and makes it hard to clean. Overall, it cheapened the look of my Watch and I took it off after a few days of giving it a try. I will NOT be purchasing this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Protects the sides, but looked dirty and didn't work well with swimming
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this case provided a nice protective bumper all the way around, even the sides. However, I found it looked very dirty within a week of wearing. Also, if you want to use your watch while swimming, I found that the way water becomes trapped between this cover and the watch makes it very hard to press anything. It made the touch surface hard to work with. Within a couple of weeks, I ditched this cover for one of the ones that is more like a sticker that seals against the surface of the watch face.
customer_reviews.author: Kadiebug

customer_reviews.title: This will save your screen!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to get an Apple Watch because I was terrified of scratching or smashing the screen. I had no idea these plastic bumpers existed. It is perfect and protects the screen from sticky stuff and scratches. I am a bartender so my hands are constantly in and out of coolers and banging against bottles. This thing has taken a beating and has some scratches on it so I will eventually need another one, but I would way rather buy more of these than have a very expensive scratched Apple Watch. It does get wet when working out but I just take it off and rinse/dry it and put it right back on after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed with this item. Love my Apple Watch so much and want to protect it. For a non active person this would be fantastic. The silicone/rubbery cover will definitely protect from scratches but once there’s an ounce on moisture, forget the touch screen. I went swimming and figured ok, that’s a lot of water. I had to replace it with the second one because a film formed on the inside and looks dingy. The second one I had to take off after I went for a run. I tend to sweat a lot and the sweat from under the watch seeped under. Once again, useless touchscreen :/
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wright

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL protection for your watch!
customer_reviews.text: While you receive total protection for your watch, keep in mind that this cover is thicker than the other cover sheets. This means that the haptic sensitivity is less than when without. This being said, you will get used to it very quickly. The other thing is that despite it fitting fairly tight, I find that I have to remove it weekly for cleaning INSIDE the cover. For some reason, condensation brings in a slight haze inside the cover that is easily cleaned with a soft tissue. Not a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: Signforu

customer_reviews.title: If you are never around water this is a great product
customer_reviews.text: So this product seemed very durable and it probably is. Just never got to using it long enough. The reason for not using it long enough is because even if a small amount of water/moisture gets between the screen and case, it renders the watch practically unusable until it is opened back up and cleaned, which I can tell you from repeatedly doing it can be a very big pain in the ass. Other than that, seems like an overall decent product if it wasn't for that issue that I ran into.
customer_reviews.author: Nishanth Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price(updated)
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seller reached out to me(a year later) to correct my issues. I was sent a black glass case and it works perfectly ! Great protection! Can’t wait for them to launch with more colors. I highly recommend the black glass protective case. Seller could definitely have reached out sooner, but I’m thankful they did nonetheless. Origins review: It gets dingy really quick! Idk why that is but it has this ashy look to it after about a weeks wear. The TPU IS OK. Works decently nothing special. Does not work if you’re a swimmer or sweat a lot. I wash my hands constantly and once a drop of water gets under it, it can’t recognize touch.
customer_reviews.author: khajaiva

customer_reviews.title: This brand works best!
customer_reviews.text: This Smiling brand case is great! It curves with the watch & allows you to swipe side to side just like you can without it on. (Penom brand does NOT do this!!!) It has already saved my watch from contact with a concrete wall. Mine has clouded up a couple of times - I think due to condensation from the high humidity and thunderstorms this summer - a simple wash with a little soap and water clears it up & makes it like new. This case is worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Saves me from damaging the face of watch!
customer_reviews.text: I can't count how many times this has saved me from scratching or damaging the face of my Apple Watch. I am so glad I purchased this, as I garden daily and usually am bumping into something! This is a perfect protection for me. My only con is when I sweat it gets damp underneath the shield and this causes a problem with the touchscreen. Sometimes, I have to remove one side of the band and the remove the shield, just to dry it off. But otherwise, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Works until you sweat...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this item a 3 1/2 star rating for one main issue- it has a bad habit of retaining moisture under the screen when I wear the watch during strenuous activities that make me sweat. I live in Florida, and it’s not uncommon to get rather warm and humid. At first the protective cover worked great, but once I ran or did any physical activity, water would accumulate under the protector and negate the touch function of the watch face digitizer. I think for everyday use the item is fine, but not when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Lisa Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I was noticing that I had a tendency to bump my watch on things, so I got these screen protectors. They fit well, and are as sensitive to touch as if I was touching the watch directly. If the watch gets wet you do have to remove the cover and dry it, but I assume that would be true for any cover. They do seem to scuff easily, but I just look at that as a mark that isn't on my watch! And the scuffs are only visibly when the screen is black. They don't interfere with seeing the face. They are very inexpensive, so if they don't last long, I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: LookingForSolutions

customer_reviews.title: Good overall except you can't get it wet
customer_reviews.text: It works well and protects my screen just like I wanted it to and it is not harder to use the touch screen function. The only issue I have with it is you are not able to get it wet without water getting stuck under the casing. You have to take it completely apart to dry it.
customer_reviews.author: amy malone

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to remove. The flaw is that it hold a lot of water/moister in between the watch and the cover. I had to stop using it because that’s how much water was getting in. It is good thick materiel so it does protect from scratching and dings, but because of its thickness, I found that I had to tap extra harder for the watch to open.
customer_reviews.author: Venssa

customer_reviews.title: Made it right..
customer_reviews.text: Within 2-3 weeks it became cloudy / dirty smudged looking. Tried cleaning it with a dry glasses wipe with no luck. Took it off and put the second one on.. again same thing happened. Old saying, you get what you pay for... 🤦‍♀️ EDIT...04/17/2020 The seller reached out to me to make this right. I was given 3 different things I could pick from as their way of making things right with me. I may have had a bad experience with their product but their customer service is outstanding!! I now say, give them a try, you’ve got nothing to loose!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P

customer_reviews.title: Don't work out, it's ok
customer_reviews.text: It works ok, if you never get wet or ever sweat while working out. I take spinning classes and at beginning of class, I can start my workout of mode for "indoor cycling" just fine. But as soon as class ends and I want to stop the count and check, it won't respond since perspiration builds up between watch and cover. I tried it 4 times. Once I even hd to eject moisture by turning dial, since it literally got sucked into watch. I sweat, but at a normal level, it's not like I am drenched head to toe. So if you go to the gym, this will not work for you
customer_reviews.author: Regina C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my watch and it chipped and cracked a bit. Instead of paying a ton of money to have the glass replaced, I decided to get a case for it. The case fits my 40 mm face perfectly. It is very clear, but also slightly hides the visibility of the crack on the glass. I noticed some reviewers are worried about yellowing over time. I am not really concerned with that considering the package came with two cases and the price was cheap. My only complaint is that in the sunlight there is a slight glare. However, it is not bad enough for me to take away a full star. I will buy this again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy R

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 40mm Apple Watch Series 4 perfectly. This pack of 2, completely covers the entire front and all sides while leaving the camera open. It provides great protection from everyday bumps and scratches. Very happy with this purchase. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angel-a

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: As many reviews have said, this product, which it does what it's supposed to, gets mucked up almost instantly. It gets scratched and marred with everything you do; then it looks like crap. Mine got so bad, I couldn't even see my watch face anymore. I will say the touch screen was still very active; no issues there. And, the product is easy-ish to put on and take off. For the price, it's ok, but I expected it to last longer. I got maybe a day or two out of it before it started to get marked up.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for a new 40mm Apple watch. It fit perfectly and is barely noticeable when on my wrist. It has already saved me from scratches as I bump into things a lot. When my kids came to visit, they loved the case, so I bought them each one for their Apple watches. The cases arrived very fast, and the kids put them on immediately and were thrilled! The cases fit their watches perfectly as well. I can't praise this case enough. Love, love, LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Sample

customer_reviews.title: *UPDATED REVIEW AS OF 5/16/2020
customer_reviews.text: Originally when I had ordered this product, it did not work effectively with my Apple Watch. However, after leaving my review, the company reached out to me and sent me a revised product. This new cover clips on and off easily. Sometimes water gets in it, however it clips off so easily that it takes seconds to dry. I feel much safer using my apple watch with this product keeping it safe. I highly recommend this product to anyone with an apple watch. Excellent customer service and overall very high-quality product. Does not leave any room for my apple watch to be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: nicolemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection, Problems with Sweat/Moisture
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty great for what it does, and it doesn't take up a terrible amount of space protruding out. The touchscreen works, for the most part, however, there is a slight issue when it comes to sweat and moisture. Whenever sweat or moisture gets in between the case and the Watch, it somewhat interferes with the touchscreen portion and may have incorrect touch inputs. Usually, a simple wipe of the case underneath should help, but besides that, a solid case.
customer_reviews.author: Vir Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Protection at the expense of functionality
customer_reviews.text: I initially liked the case because it was a perfect fit for the watch but it's been giving me issues regarding functionality: I can't swipe up or, if I get the Apple Watch wet, it will stop allowing me to input the passcode numbers. Ultimately its a decision where you choose if you want to protect the watch and use it minimally but if you interact with it constantly I don't recommend the case. ** Update ** I was approached by customer service regarding my review, they kindly offered an Amazon gift card and a sample for the new model for this case, in exchange for an updated review. They are attentive and respond quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Castañeda

customer_reviews.title: Sweat/Water gets in between
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch cover a 3 ⭐️ overall because, although it does keep my watch from getting scratches, it doesn’t seal very well and I kept getting sweat/water trapped in between it and my Apple Watch so I had to remove the cover every time to dry it. And, removing it was irritating because I had to remove my watch band each time to get it off just to dry it off, which was a lot. Then, the cover looked old and cloudy from rinsing and dying it so often. I ended up return this and plan to find something else to protect my watch.
customer_reviews.author: KKL—L&L’s Little Shop of Goodies- Living Life RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: Necessary!
customer_reviews.text: I was very lucky to have installed the case immediately. The first week I accidentally hit it on doorway entrances getting paint scratched onto it. It took some effort to get that off most of the way after a week or two. This case is amazing. It probably would have broken the screen if it wasn’t protected. I have a backup, but am waiting to switch until I become adjusted more. I have not hit it on anything wearing the watch on the inside of my wrist. Still it is nice the case will protect it from anything rubbing against it when I carry things, fall, or have it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty1430

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for anyone who bumps their watch all day. My only complaint would be that stuff gets underneath the screen protector and makes it not as clear as it could be. It's also a little hard to get the cover off so it's annoying to have to clean it. Touch screen seems to work fairly well, I've had a couple of issues but nothing too bad.l For the price I'd say this is an excellent product. I think I might eventually get a separate case and screen protector where things can't get under it though because this kind of annoys me. My fault for choosing this style though.
customer_reviews.author: MWright

customer_reviews.title: Protective and barely noticeable! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping it was. Fully protects my Apple Watch without a worry when bumping it into something or rubbing against something. Awesome product. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is due to the touch screen working good except when using a finger to spell out words in text messages. Ive experienced some problems with the watch not fully reading my finger motion on some of the letters due to having the case on, so I have to spend a little more time to really accurately press my finger right, but it’s nothing I would return this product due to. Overall I highly recommend. I can barely even tell it’s there when looking at my watch
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to expect
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller contacted me and asked me if I would change my review. I am sticking with what I said originally about the watch case making the watch inoperable as soon as moisture gets underneath it. The seller stated they changed suppliers, however I cannot confirm this. Purchase at your own risk. This watch protector is horrible. Save your money and time. I should have listened to what others said. If you plan on doing any type of activities that might cause you to sweat, your watch will become inoperable. It has happened to me twice today! Returning and not purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: racegirlie

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with product. Installing is bit difficult as one has to stretch case over watch face and hope one doesn’t mess up watch settings. One would think this case would provide decent protection from moisture but it doesn’t. Case allows moisture (workout sweat) and water splashes in between case & watch face and hinders touch screen. Directions mention one can either put pieces of paper towel along edges of case on backside or smear a light coating of dish soap on inside of case before installing. Really? Doing either with a new Apple Watch 4 is ridiculous. I do not recommend this product and do not purchase. There are better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: A great shield for your smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. The only negative comment that I have is that when I work out, I sweat a lot. Sweat seeps under this cover and onto the watch face. After each workout I have to remove both bands in order to remove this cover. Although it sounds like an ordeal, it takes less than 5 minutes to get everything removed, wiped down and dried off, and reassembled. The touch screen works great, and the protective case is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and does a great job of protecting my watch. I am still able to easily use my watch- the touchscreen works perfectly. My only frustration is that sometimes when I wash my hands, water gets between the protective case and my watch so I have to take it all apart and dry it out. This might just be me though and the way I wash my hands. This has also caused the protective case to look a tiny bit foggy but it still works perfectly. Overall, a great price and great quality. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Coburns

customer_reviews.title: Interfered with watch function
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a defective one, but this interfered terribly with my being able to interact with my watch. I started using it today and I told myself “I can live with having to use my fingernail or having to retry commands”. However, I washed my hands, and a drop of water must have gotten between the case and the watch face, rendering the watch completely unusable. The amount of times I have to wash my hands these days, it’s a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Cover Material
customer_reviews.text: From first glance I thought this cover was a hard plastic cover. But it is a soft clear cover. Fits well and easy to install. Does exactly what I wanted it to do, prevent scratches because I am a little clumsy and keep hating things with it. Package also comes with 2! That was a pleasant surprise. Maybe I didn't read the description or missed that. But it was a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Barcena

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last a week
customer_reviews.text: Within one week of wearing the screen protector it scratched in the corner. It scratched white too so I’m guessing that’s the color plastic they use. It would’ve been better if it was a clear scratch...or not scratch at all with one weeks wear. I don’t work in a warehouse or with machinery either. I just don’t think the wear and tear on this protector is worth it. EDIT** the company has since reached out to me to make it right and thus I am raising a star for good communication and honesty in offering to make it right. If there is ever an use they have been quick to get back and make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay!
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty low profile cover and although it didn’t look as nice as wearing the watch alone, it didn’t take away too much from the beauty of the watch. My problem was that I wore it while running a 10k race and the entire thing fogged up and made the touchscreen unusable. After the race I couldn’t even stop the timer without completely taking off the watch and bands. So this is not a good product for outdoor runners.
customer_reviews.author: Iteach2nd

customer_reviews.title: Keeps watch safe, but is annoying
customer_reviews.text: So this protector is amazing for keeping scratching and cracking away- however, it’s really hard with any amount of water/sweat underneath. The touch becomes practically useless when any sort of moisture get under the plastic. It’s an easy fix- but super annoying- especially when you’re on a hike and need to do something and have to stop and take the whole thing apart to dry it. Other than that- I’ve enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: mc jones

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not worthy of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the case as a protective case. I do not, however, like how water gets trapped underneath when you simply wash hands. Once the water is underneath the case, the touchscreen is almost disfunctiinal. I've had my case on my watch for 2 days now and I've had to remove the case at least 3 times (which is a pain) to dry off the watch and case. I've now tried to avoid getting it damp/wet by removing my watch before washing my hands (which is ANOTHER pain)!
customer_reviews.author: Rolitta

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: after a few weeks of reviewing Apple Watches from used sources, and seeing that 98% listed scratched/dented cases I broke down & bought my watch new. I bought this item in an attempt to prevent the scratches so many owners complained about. I received this protector a day prior to my watch-so shipping was fast!. The protector fits realllllly snug & they even include alcohol wipes to clean you watch with prior to applying. WOW to that! I would highly recommend these protectors for anyone with an AppleWatch.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great protective cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great clear watch case cover. Covers top and all sides with perfect openings. Can change bands with ease. Very scratch resistant. Good strong flexible material. I got scratches/cracks on old Apple watch with no protection and needed to replace it. (could not trade in). Now my new watch looks beautiful, responds accurately with touch, And protects from most damages. Wouild recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita

customer_reviews.title: Great design however it requires patience
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Apple Watch series 5 and it fit perfectly. It came with two clear protective sleeves for the screen and alcohol wipes. Pros: - Sleek design (looks good on device) - Protects privacy - Comes with a backup -Clear installation instructions - Prevents scratches and damage Cons: - distorts Watch display a very small amount (doesn’t bother me at all) - Tight fit may make it hard to install (if you are careful then it’ll fit just fine) - Biggest flaw is the touch screen sensitivity (sometimes the screen will not want to read my thumb however it will always read my index finger)
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Elayer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for price
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen isn't super responsive at times. On occasion have to touch it several times to make it work. So mildly annoying, but not enough for me to hate it. It isn't waterproof, so if you go swimming, shower, or something of the like, I would remove it. I definitely traps water under it. It does fit snugly, which I appreciate and the button and crown are easy to use with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Deedlit Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Protects phone-touch screen not as sensitive - inconvenient to clean
customer_reviews.text: Liked • protects the screen well • easy to put put on and remove. • comes in a two pack for a back up. • not very noticeable Disliked • gets dirty under the case and it’s an inconvenience to clean. The bands have to be taken off the watch in order to remove the case. • I have small hands so it was easy for me to remove the case from the screen. However my husband had difficulty. He was unable to remove the case using only his hands. • touch screen not as sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Kay-La Deen

customer_reviews.title: Protects but traps water
customer_reviews.text: It provides good protection, covering the corners and sides of the watch. As long as it stays completely dry it works very well. However, every single time I wash my hands, a small amount of water will splash on the watch and get trapped under the protector, which makes the touch screen not work and makes the screen difficult to see. In order to clear it you have to remove at least one side of the protector which can only be done by removing one side of the watch band. This makes it unacceptable for me - I can't be taking my watch off, removing the band, and cleaning the protector every time I wash my hands all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I use to just use a screen protector on my watch. I wanted something that fully protected everything. With the line of work I’ve have done, and am doing, my watch seems to be the scape goat of every door frame, cooking utensil, or mail box. This casing protects the sides, and glass from scratches, and dirt. However, the work my husband does, makes him sweat, and his casing gets wet under it, but no fear! We just followed directions and smeared some dawn dish liquid on the inside, which seems to be working thus far. Thanks for providing a great protection for my clumsy self and the watch I wear, and my husbands watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber P

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work for me but customer service is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice, stays on well however moisture gets between the cover and the watch screen just from sweating. My whole purpose of getting this protector was to protect watch from scratches when working in the garden. Once you get overheated moisture developed between the cover and the watch. Once this happens the touch screen does not respond to even a hard touch. However customer service was outstanding! They contacted me and offered several solutions. I did not expect this and was overwhelmed with their service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other screen protectors that just clip on over the face of your watch, and also ones that stick on, and I have to say this one is by far, the best one out there. It’s very clear, and it does not fall off like the clip on ones do. You will love these. In my opinion it’s the best one you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Cagle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my series 4 apple watch. The plastic is nice quality and thick enough to protect but not too thick that its bulky. be careful with water that gets under it though, it messes with the touch screen and is difficult to type but all in all isn't a problem. They do also yellow over time but its a long time and you cant really notice unless you look at it off the watch through the light...would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it safe!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Apple Watch and do have to say it does exactly what it needs to. Have hit and bumped my apply watch on several things and this case has kept it safe. Does get a little cloudy over time if it is not properly cleaned every now and then but I would definitely recommend it. I don’t personally like that it makes the watch look slightly bigger than its sleek design but it is definitely worth it to keep it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Almost invisible watch protection
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far the best watch protection I've bought for the iWatch. It is easy to install, withstands a lot of abuse, doesn't affect the touch performance of the watch, and almost unnoticeable. This is the second one I've purchased. The first one lasted over two years but started to yellow slightly so I replaced it with a new one. Can't beat the price for the protection offered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought a plastic case for my new Apple Watch 5. The seller is great, the product is disappointing. Water causes dullness on the screen between the face and the inside of the plastic. It makes it a little hard to see and it's a pain to keep taking it off to wipe it after every time it gets wet, which is all the time with me, I work i health cares so I am constantly washing my hands!
customer_reviews.author: C. Machowski

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Even though it fit the Apple Watch Series 4. It did not stay clean. It was hard to put on and take off. It was constantly dirty and I could not make out the screen when I needed to. I was always cleaning out before and after putting it on even following the first initial directions. Ultimately I still have it but do not use it and purchased a completely different product.
customer_reviews.author: mirabella2

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect! comes off and on easy. Protects my watch from every day use as well as heavy use during working out or obstacle course races. The one thing that is not so great is if you’re working out and sweat gets in it or if going in the water the touchscreen does not work this is probably common with many screen protectors but it is one thing to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Love Agne

customer_reviews.title: update
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give 3 stars is because it gets dirty underneath very easily. It’s hard to clean. You have to take off the entire cover which is not fun. It fogs up, gets dirt and pet hair underneath. Update: the company reached out and offered me a refund or an updated case. I chose the update. Love it! Stays clean! It isn’t as sensitive to the touch as the other case. I have to hold my finger longer or tap more but I would rather that than have to clean every 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this case for 3 days and already I would not recommend it. It probably does a sufficient job at protecting, but it is not compatible with everyday living. If even the slightest bit of water, say from washing your hands, gets caught under the case. Yes, the watch is water proof, but to remove the water, you have to completely disassemble the watch by taking off both bands, then taking off the case, and then wiping out the case and the watch. This happens quite often and gets really annoying after about the second time. It is also easy for dirt to get under the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Swiger

customer_reviews.title: Meh - Not the best case but it fit well.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this case for about 2 months. When I got it, I noticed the touch receptors within the screen section (appears as little dots; common on screen covers) were very visible even when not in direct sunlight. Even with regular cleanings, it became scratched, buffed up, and had an almost "cloudy" appearance relatively fast. It's clearly not scratch resistant as they claim. I recently purchased a new one from a different "random amazon brand" and it's already proving to be of higher quality. And I got two for the price of one! Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz R.

customer_reviews.title: Good protection and good value
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. Alter a few scrapes from being in a wheelchair, and bumping my watch against stuff, you can see what could have been on my watch. Inspected my watch after taking off the damaged cover it looks brand new. Second cover protects it again. For the price these can be replaced every so often and not kill the pocketbook, or the watch.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Best protetor i have tried...
customer_reviews.text: I first tried a film protector which did not stick, then a tempered glass protector, which did not conform to the curves of the watch face and was ridiculous- i threw it away immediately. Finally, this case works well. Although have not quite figured it out for swimming.. had trouble swiping watch face etc when watch and case are wet from swimming- finally took case off, dried both and put back on. Hopefully will figure out something simpler than that in the future. Otherwise, very happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Reid

customer_reviews.title: Nice it won’t rebuy
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector protects the phone and stops it from getting scratches but it leaves a haze look to your screen and being in healthcare professional having to wash my hands a lot, water is able to get in between and sits until I take the watch off (including bands) to dry it out. It looks like airpockets after washing my hands or showering!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good look and protection, bad for moisture.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and functionality of this case, but if you have to wash your hands a lot or deal with water above your wrists this may not be for you. The water gets trapped under the protector and dampens (literally and technologically) the functionality of the touch screen and it’s a pain to take off just to dry out repeatedly. If moisture isn’t an issue for you then it’s a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula R.

customer_reviews.title: worth buying & worth the price !!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is it will get foggy, just have to clean it here and there. Would recommend this product. Update : seller got in contact with me and informed me they have a different manufacturer for this product. Due to the inconvenience of the product getting foggy and just having to be cleaned, I was sent their new material. The new material is TPU glass material with a hard PC case as of right now they only have Black as their color. But soon they will be stocking up with more colors. Highly recommend and was very satisfied with me experience. Will be purchasing their new colors once they are available. Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tavarez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install but that is about the only good thing I can say. The cover is not very clear and has a textured face (I assume this has some purpose as it relates to the touch screen) that makes the picture blurry. My watch (a brand new Nike SE) could only recognize my touch intermittently and at times would jumó to apps as though I had touched it when I hadn’t.
customer_reviews.author: kthibeault

customer_reviews.title: Overall a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works well and looks nice. Not real bulky but we are having a few problems when we touch our Apple face. The passcode doesn’t catch or microphone. We’ll still trying to see if it’s the watch itself or the cover. We didn’t have any problems, or notice the problems shall I say until after adding the guard. Overall though it’s a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: After the first day of putting one on my watch, it made a large white scratch on the plastic. I’ve created a lot so far on it but i wont change it out till it gets really bad. Sometimes when i turn my wrist towards me the screen wont turn on and i’ll have to tap it (i got into the habit of tapping with my nose if i have stuff in my hands). There is usually a little gap between the rubber/plastic case and my screen so when i tap, you can feel it. It does protect my watch though since I accidentally bang my watch on things ALOT.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I mean,2 stars because it is scratch resistant. Don’t think you’re doing to workout with this screen protector. Sweat gets under it and you have to take it all apart and dry it off and reassemble it. I’ve had it 2 months and it’s not as clear anymore and it doesn’t always let the touch screen feature work 100% properly. Don’t waste your money on this. Just buy a regular screen protector and bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover
customer_reviews.text: My apple watch "rubber band" came loose and the face landed on tile. I had a screen protector on but it didn't help as the glass shattered in three areas. I love this protection. I can use my watch as usual and I can't even see the protection on the watch. Has anyone ever had any damage from their watch dropping? I doubt i,t because this cover looks like it will hold up to almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dema

customer_reviews.title: Protect your watch with very little little interference with functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my 4 series. I was recently doing some yard work which would have probably left some serious scratches on my watch. This screen protector took the beating instead. It is a great weigh and size - doesn’t look too bulky and interferes very little with the usage of the watches touch required features, i.e., a couple of times I did have to touch the screen twice to access a function. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mew

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you take it off to wash your hands
customer_reviews.text: Initial review: Water got under the case very easily and was hard to clean out. Other than that I guess it’s ok. But I got so tired of it I took the bumper off after less than a week Edit: the company sent me a set of traditional screen protectors and border/bumper instead. I liked the screen protectors MUCH better. I’d go that route. I don’t see where they’re available on Amazon, but go that route! Now people from the company are emailing constantly asking me to take down my review (seriously every 3-5 days). I maintain my thoughts on this product and direct you all, instead to find screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Besssssssssst product hands down!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first when reading comments..... I know sometimes 3rd party products aren’t always what they appear to be. Well I work in the health care field and I am always bumping the face of my watch against something and was terribly afraid of shattering my screen! When I say this is THE BEST product I’ve ever used, seriously it is. I’ve attached a few photos so you guys can see how well and snug it actually fits.... it’s like cut to perfection AND you get two in a box. The touch screen works with absolutely no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: High quality and best protector without drawbacks of bubbled screen protectors with loose corners.
customer_reviews.text: High quality case that protects the apple watch. My wife has tried two other covers and keeps going back to this. We have read about many cracked screens so felt something like this would be necessary. The screen sensitivity is slightly reduced but the cover seems to be the best for protecting without negative side effects. She has used the same protector since the end of February and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MikeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to install, only took me about a minute. Only thing that I hate is that there are little dots inside the protector itself so when you look at your watch, you can see them. But they aren’t so bad to where I can’t see anything. Just annoying. Also it scratches easily. I already have a big scratch through the center of the screen. Oh well, that’s why I got the thing is so I’ll scratch that and not the watch itself. Overall a good product and I’d buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Zorotrian

customer_reviews.title: An easy solution to concerns about possibly fragile Apple Watch face.
customer_reviews.text: This Apple watch case is inexpensive and surprisingly transparent to touch. When I first touched it, I thought "No way will this work to transmit touch to the screen on the watch," but I was wrong. It works great and provides protection to the watch at a very modest price. My cat has already knocked the watch to the floor, and it was completely protected by the Smiling Apple Watch 4 Clear Case.
customer_reviews.author: M.M. Rodenbucher

customer_reviews.title: Gets very dirty
customer_reviews.text: It takes away from the quality of the screen and after having it for a couple months it gets dirty and it’s not easy to clean. Will not be using it
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Revnic

product_meta.title: Smiling Case for Apple Watch Series 4 & Series 5 with Built in TPU Screen Protector 40mm - All Around Protective Case for Apple watch Series 5/4 40mm (clear)
product_meta.description:
Smiling Apple Watch Series 5 and series 4 clear case with built-in TPU screen protector iwatch 40mm (2 pack) 
Special design: Designed for the 40mm 2019 Series 5 and 2018 series 4 and Apple Watch, this 
high-quality TPU case with 

Precise cutout: This 40mm watch case was designed with precise cutouts for functional buttons 
and ports. It is very easy to use All ports, buttons, and the mic without removing the case. 

Ultra slim: This Apple watch case front cover is only 0.3mm and total 0.5oz weight not add any 

bulk and you will not lose any touch sensitivity. 99% high transparency. You nearly cannot tell 
The difference when this case is on your Apple Watch 

Shock-proof: made of high quality, anti-scratch TPU, this case covers the full front and curved 
edges of the I watch, offering full protection for your apple Watch against scratches, drops, 
and bumps. 

package: 
2 Pack clear case for Apple Watch 40mm
feature_bullets: [Designed for apple watch 40mm]: This case fit for Apple Watch 2019 newest series 5 and 2018 series 4 Apple Watch 40mm, high-quality TPU case with built in screen protector.
[Precise cutout]: This 40mm apple watch case was designed with precise cutouts for functional buttons and ports.
[Ultra slim]: This Apple watch case front cover is only 0.3mm and total 0.5oz weight not add any bulk and you will not lose any touch sensitivity.

[Shock-proof]: Made of high quality, anti-scratch TPU, this case covers the full front and curved edges of the I watch, Offering full protection for YOUR Apple Watch against Scratches, drops, and bumps.
Includes: 2 pack High quality TPU case for the 40mm Series 5/ series 4 Apple Watch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars11,145 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
